vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Neh.8.7; also called Judah (NIV: Hodaviah) at Ezr.3.9; 1x
Also named: ye.hu.dah (יְהוּדָה "Judah" H3063M)
§ Hodijah = "my majesty is Jehovah"
1) a Levite in the time of Ezra and Nehemiah
2) another Levite at the same time
3) a chief of the people at the same time
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hombre; tribu de Judá; (b)   varios hombres; en tiempos de Esdras
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
荷第雅 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "我的最高權威是耶和華"
1) 以斯拉、尼希米時期的一個利未人 (尼8:7,9:5,10:10)
2) 同時期的另一個利未人 (尼10:13)
3) 同時期的一個人民領袖 (尼10:18)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
荷第雅 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "我的最高权威是耶和华"
1) 以斯拉、尼希米时期的一个利未人 (尼8:7,9:5,10:10)
2) 同时期的另一个利未人 (尼10:13)
3) 同时期的一个人民领袖 (尼10:18)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.10.13
§ Hodijah = "my majesty is Jehovah"
1) a Levite in the time of Ezra and Nehemiah
2) another Levite at the same time
3) a chief of the people at the same time

A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.10.18
§ Hodijah = "my majesty is Jehovah"
1) a Levite in the time of Ezra and Nehemiah
2) another Levite at the same time
3) a chief of the people at the same time
